hero-section.title:
Any Chain, Any App, All Users.
One Push Chain.
hero-section.description:
The first Layer 1 built for Universal Apps. 
Build & Deploy once, onboard users from any chain.
hero-section.primary-button-title: Start your builder's journey with Push Chain!

header.main-text: Built on innovations to eliminate fragmenation!
header.other-text: Push is the only Universal Layer 1 you will ever need!

box1.bodytext: Push Chain supports transactions from any blockchain. Users can pay gas in any token — No need for bridging.
box1.imagealt: Illustration showing different blockchain logos falling in a pin ball machine.

box2.bodytext: Let any wallet from any chain connect, interact, and transact. Break web3 barriers by using social login or email. User get to decide on Push Chain.
box2.imagealt: Illustration showing Metamask wallet, Phantom Wallet, etc coming out of a big wallet with Push Chain logo on it.
box2.imagetitle: Supports any existing wallets like Metamask, Phantom, etc along with social login

box3.bodytext: Deploy with zero on-chain code. Turn your native app into a universal app in minutes.
box3.imagealt: Illustration showing Ethereum Virtual Machine logo spinning and saying 100% EVM Compatibility.
box3.imagetitle: Zero on-chain code changes required, 100% EVM Compatible.

box4.bodytext: Build once, run cross chain, multi step experiences  with a single, future-proof contract.
box4.imagealt: Illustration showing lines of code required for Push Protocol integration
box4.imagetitle: Deploy once, instantly become compatible with all supported chains (EVM or non-EVM).

box5.bodytext: Let’s users pay gas in any token, on any chain without bridging.
box5.imagealt: Illustration showing different logos of Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana rotating around Push Chain
box5.imagetitle: Supports any token of any chain for transactions.

box6.bodytext: Build atomic, composable apps across web3. Create never seen before app experiences, by having multiple users of different chains transact with the same app.
box6.imagealt: Illustration showing different tetris blocks entering a wormhole and Push Chain logo emerging from the other end.
box6.imagetitle: Transactions from any chain finalize on Push Chain, enabling users of any chain to natively use the same app aka Universal Execution Layer.

box7.bodytext: Access account and state data from other chains in your smart contract.
box7.imagealt: Illustration showing Push Chain growing in blocks style animation.
box7.imagetitle: (Roadmap) Shared State allows access to account and state data from other chains in your smart contract.

box8.bodytext: Trigger, validate, and complete transactions across any chain using your smart contract.
box8.imagealt: Illustration showing tetris blocks in different colors merging and changing.
box8.imagetitle: (Roadmap) Programmable Solvers allow users to trigger, validate, and complete transactions across any chain using your smart contract.

footer.title: your app's user base by going universal
footer.ctatitle: Deploy once, 10x your userbase. Visit Developer Docs.

stats-section.title: Achieve
stats-section.description:
Optimized for performance.
High TPS, ultra-low gas, and sub-second
finality for real-time app execution.

stat1.title: Supported Chains
stat1.imagetitle: List of all supported chains like Ethereum, Solana, BNB Chain, etc

investors-section.title: Built by the team trusted by pioneers of web3

network-section.title: Learn how Push Network becomes L2 for web3 communication!
network-section.third-text: Stake Push for API Calls to the Network

article1.text: We saw a driven, innovative builder who was deeply committed to Ethereum's growth and success.

article2.text: The company hopes to address the lack of cross-blockchain communication with easy messaging tools.

article3.text: Push Protocol is the “Missing piece of Web3” that is required to bring the UX of Web2 to Web3.

article4.text: Decentralized push notifications may transform what dapps can do.

article5.text: Web3 communication networks and decentralized teams go together like peanut butter and jelly.

article6.text: Unstoppable Domains launches badge-gated group chat feature for username holders powered by Push Chat.

article7.text: Collaboration with Push Protocol aims to fend off misinformation and scams.

article8.text: Push Protocol, recently completed Phase 1 of its (BRB) dev tour in India. A hackathon participant successfully solved a challenge brought forth by our team: Quantum Proofing Ethereum accounts.

article9.text: Push Chain, a Layer 1 blockchain focused on chain abstraction and building web3 applications accessible across different networks. Push Chain aims to address fragmented user experiences and scalability issues.

article10.text: Push Chain aims to solve the problems of fragmented user experience and scalability.

article11.text: Architecture supports interactions across EVM and non-EVM ecosystems, allowing developers to access wallet states from distinct networks without relying on fragmented infrastructure.
